timeline.message: Fix for recent events not being recent

timeline.bodyText: Why did you change this from a List to a Set? Won't you lose the queries' sort orders?
timeline.author: coverbeck

replies.bodyText: Was originally attempting to remove duplicate events, I'll change it back to list.  I don't think sorted set works anyways.
replies.author: garyluu

timeline.bodyText:
A bit misleading, the test only checks that there are 6 events in general.
Same idea with two lines down
timeline.author: denis-yuen

replies.bodyText: It was only supposed to test for 6 events.  The comment was only to provide additional details for debugging purposes.
replies.author: garyluu

replies.bodyText:
Understood, what I meant was that the test would be better if it actually checked for 1 create, 1 approve, 4 modify events.
Right now, it looks like the test could pass if it got 6 create events.
replies.author: denis-yuen

replies.bodyText: Yes, that's what it's intended to do.  I'm testing whether the pagination works for this endpoint not whether the event type was correctly set.  We have other tests for that.
replies.author: garyluu
